title: Area/Vol: region bounded by cubic and trig functions part - a

content.description: Let R be the region in the first quadrant enclosed by the graphs of f(x) = 8x3 and g(x) = sin (π x) , as shown in the figure above.
content.question: Write an equation for the line tangent to the graph of f at=1/2 .

frqParts.text: Write an equation for the line tangent to the graph of f at=1/2 .

topic.text: 2.2: Defining the Derivative of a Function and Using Derivative Notation

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
